channel.title: Siyuan Fan on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Siyuan Fan on EICP-LAB

item.title: 2025 ICEF Conference
item.description: MPhil student Siyuan Fan was invited to present her co-authored research with Professor Yangsiyu Lu, titled “Identifying Climate Adaptation Projects in Local Government Bonds: Using AI-Supported Text Analysis,” at the 2025 International Conference on Climate and Energy Finance (ICEF), held in Guangzhou, China, from June 13 to 15.

item.title: Dissertation Oral Defense
item.description:
Congratulations to MPhil student Siyuan Fan!

Siyuan Fan, the first graduate from our EICP group, has successfully passed her dissertation oral defense. Her work was built on a solid and thought-provoking research project titled “Identifying Climate Adaptation Projects in Local Government Bonds: Using AI-Supported Text Analysis.” Siyuan’s contributions have set a strong example for future students.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: MPhil student Siyuan Fan participated in CNCC Green Bag and delivered a talk about “Identifying Climate Adaptation Projects in Local Government Bonds Using LLMs".
